channel.title: motorcycling on james.goodhouse.io
channel.description: Recent content in motorcycling on james.goodhouse.io

item.title: Hello Moto
item.description: Today I brought home a new motorcycle; a 2021 Triumph Tiger 900 RALLY Pro. I picked the yet-to-be-named bike up from Cascade Moto Classics. This is my 5th motorcycle, and my second Triumph. Home, sweet home. The Tiger home from its first ride. My last Triumph was a 2009 Thruxton. I loved that bike, but it didn’t fit my needs super well. It was a blast to ride, was absolutely gorgoues, sounded mean as hell, and overall was a great bike.
